title: C. Decimal sum
statement: You are given an array of integer numbers. Calculate the sum of its elements.
inputSpecification: The first line of the input contains an integer n (1 ≤ n ≤ 100) — the size of the array. Next n lines contain the elements of the array, one per line. Each element is an integer between 1 and 100, inclusive.
outputSpecification: Output the sum of the elements of the array.
name: Decimal sum
